CRAFT.DATA1: 2 = denominator of calculation applied to faction value of this town

CRAFT.DATA1: 1 = numerator applied to purchase cost to determine peace cost
CRAFT.DATA2: 9 = denominator applied to purchase cost to determine peace cost
CRAFT.DATA3: 1 = Cuotl use Timonium instead of Energy cost
